Garage Doors. Made simple.

The Garage Door Team South Manchester offers complete peace of mind by carrying out all the necessary services to complete the perfect installation or repair from start to finish.

We offer a free, no obligation quotation for new installations and all repair work including insurance claims.

Browse our range

Doors

With our vast experience with garage doors our knowledge enables us to choose the best garage door for your particular property. We will also be able to advise on either automation or space saving attributes to suit your needs.

Services

Whether you're looking for a new installation or repair, with over 15 years experience of fitting and repairing garage doors you can rely on the Garage Door Team to handle your enquiry from the very start to the very end.
